name: spotify-sync
author: LuisEnMarroquin <luis@marroquin.dev>
description: Sync your Spotify's playback history every hour

scripts.compile: tsc scripts/index.ts --outFile scripts/index.js --module amd --moduleResolution node && uglifyjs scripts/index.js --output public/index.js
scripts.database: docker volume create mongo; docker volume create mongoc; docker run -d --name mongo -p 27017:27017 -v mongo:/data/db -v mongoc:/data/configdb mongo:4.2;
